TemporalDirections.TEXT: 69,GEORGE,"Cause its signals, Jerry, its signals! (snapping his fingers) Dont you- all right. Did she even ask you, what you were doin tomorrow night, if you were busy?",1.0,S01E01,1.0 70,JERRY,No.,1.0,S01E01,1.0 71,GEORGE,She calls you today and she doesnt make a plan for tomorrow? What is that? Its Saturday night!,1.0,S01E01,1.0 72,JERRY,Yeah.,1.0,S01E01,1.0 73,GEORGE,"What is that? Its ridiculous! You dont even know what hotel shes staying at, you cant call her. Thats a signal, Jerry, thats a signal! (snaps his fingers) Signal!",1.0,S01E01,1.0 74,JERRY,Maybe youre right.,1.0,S01E01,1.0 75,GEORGE,Maybe Im right? Of course Im right.,1.0,S01E01,1.0 76,JERRY,"This is insane. You know, I dont even know where shes staying! She, shes not gonna call me, this is unbelievable.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 77,GEORGE,"I know, I know. Listen, your stuff has to be done by now, why dont you just see if its dry?",1.0,S01E01,1.0 78,JERRY,"No no no, dont interrupt the cycle. The machine is working, it, it knows what its doing. Just let it finish.",1.0,S01E01,1.0
